p: We estimated substantial HIV incidence among PWID in MENA. This is mainly because some of the largest countries, such as Iran and Pakistan, are affected by HIV PWID epidemics with high HIV prevalence. In several countries, PWID were found to contribute dominantly to HIV incidence. Concerted efforts are needed to bypass persistent barriers from governments, society, and health systems to improve service delivery to PWID and their retention throughout the cascade 6. Comprehensive programmes that include ART, NSP, OST, voluntary testing and counselling, and prevention of sexually transmitted infections should be established and extended to include settings of vulnerability such as prisons 38.
